featured.text: Prom night can be a dreadful experience for socially awkward teens or for those who do not secure dates.

definition.zh_def: 可怕的，令人畏懼的，糟糕的
definition.en_def: Causing or involving great fear or suffering; extremely bad or unpleasant.
definition.example: The weather was dreadful, making it impossible to go outside.
